bio:
Daynas Valen was a Dunmer treasure hunter and mage, whose corpse rests in Folgunthur; he was searching for The Gauldur Amulet.
From his journals, Valen was very ambitious in his quest, borderline obsessed with obtaining the amulet. To his own misfortune, Valen had met his end at the hands of the Draugr that guarded the halls of the Nordic ruin.
The Ivory Dragon Claw can be found on Valen's dead body. He acquired the Ivory Claw from a collector in Bravil.
name: Daynas Valen
